properties.address: Hope Church Merthyr, Mid Glamorgan CF47 8UG
properties.description: We open every Monday & Thursday morning from 10am-11.30am. A space for anyone over 18 who is lonely, isolated, or just wants to get out of the house. We are also dementia friendly. The kettle is always on, we have Wi-Fi as well as art, craft, board games, music knitting & crochet. Plenty of sofa’s for a cuppa & a chat. We have disabled access via a lift & a disabled toilet. Give Heidi a call for further information on 07790 801686
properties.title: Out For An Hour

properties.address: School Road, Blaenau Gwent, Blaenau Gwent NP23 5PP
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 15th January 2024** Re-Launching on 15th January 2024 from 10am-12pm every Monday. Each Monday we will have a different activity including talks, cookery demonstrations and craft tables for people to learn new skills such as sewing and knitting. On the 4th Monday of every month we will have a repair café running for people to bring small household items to be repaired. Refreshments will be served. Free Wi-Fi, and refreshments.
